snippet: Researchers reviewed 11 studies of statins, and while they had a similar effect on men and women by some measures, the drugs did less to reduce mortality in women.
abstract: Researchers reviewed 11 studies of statins, and while they had a similar effect on men and women by some measures, the drugs did less to reduce mortality in women.

headline.main: Women May Benefit Less From Statins
headline.print_headline: Vital Signs | Regimens: Women May Benefit Less From Statins
